ID3.title: KU Leuven Spin-off
ID3.description: As of 2021, I am working on a KU Leuven spin-off company on time series machine learning and anomaly detection. The project is funded by VLAIO as an innovation mandate.

ID2.title: Statistical Comparison of Machine Learning Classifiers
ID2.description: I compiled a simple and intuitive Python package with some statistical tools for evaluating Machine Learning models. I was inspired by the seminal paper of Demsar (2006) on the 'Statistical comparisons of classifiers over multiple data sets'. Read the paper and find the code below.

ID1.title: Anomaly Detection Algorithm Package
ID1.description: Anomaly detection algorithms aim to automatically identify examples in a dataset that are somehow different or abnormal. To this end, I wrote a small Python package that contains several unsupervised and semi-supervised anomaly detection algorithms.
